content: Yes, that's right. Creative ideas and designs are subjective and what is considered creative to one person might not appeal to another. However, it's important to remember that creativity in graphic design is not only about producing something new and unique, but also about solving problems effectively within the constraints of the project. The goal of graphic design is to communicate a message effectively to the intended audience, so designers need to ensure that their designs are not only creative but also functional and have impact. Ultimately, a good graphic design should strike a balance between being creative, impactful, and functional.
